body:
Alireza,

To be clear, the latest version is the version on the github: what you get when you click on "download zip" on this page ([https://github.com/mostaphaRoudsari/Honeybee](https://github.com/mostaphaRoudsari/Honeybee)).

The latest version IS NOT the version on the app.box, food4Rhino or the link off of the grasshopper group page.  That is just the last stable release.

You can use the "Update Ladybug" and "Update Honeybee" components to automatically sync your userobjects with the github (so you do not have to hit 'download zip').
